meanings.definition: To write or input text on a typewriter or computer.
meanings.sent1: She typed a letter to her friend on the computer.
meanings.sent2: He typed his essay on the typewriter.
meanings.sent3: The cat accidentally typed a jumble of letters on the keyboard.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers danced across the keys as she typed her thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The sound of typing filled the room as she worked diligently.

meanings.sent1: The typed document was neatly organized in the folder.
meanings.sent2: She found an old typed letter in the attic.
meanings.sent3: The typed notes were easy to read and understand.
meanings.sent4: His typed report stood out among the handwritten ones.
meanings.sent5: The typed words on the screen brought back memories of the past.
